MIN(6D)                                                 MIN(6D)





NAME
       min - calculate the minimum of two images

SYNOPSIS
       min inimage1 inimage2 outimage

DESCRIPTION
       min  calculates  the  minimum of two images and puts the
       results in outimage.

SEE ALSO
       max(6D)



IRIX 6.5                  May 5, 2004                   MIN(6D)
